title: How does a philosopher get new thoughts? - Quora

response.answer_text: Every human being gets thoughts, it's universal. However the common man ignores most of these. He is boggled down by mundane thoughts. A wo/man who is keen on seeking answers from his observations and thoughts strives for the answer.
Everyday life is itself an inspiration. You talk to people, meet new people the only difference is that a philosopher will try look at things from all the various perspectives unlike others.
